funny song's chorus i heard on wncw today

2003-03-23

Counting flowers on the wall, That don't bother me at all.
Playing Solitaire till dawn, With a deck of fifty-one.
Smoking cigarettes and watching Captain Kangaroo.
Now, don't tell me I've nothing to do.

I went to the Little River dance last night, didn't dance them all b/c my neck and back and shoulders were hurting, but they feel better now, and the dancing I did helped heal.
